knowledge.question: Which Python string function would you use to combine a list of strings into one string with each word separated by a space?
explanation: Incorrect: This will attempt to append myList to the end of the space character; however, append() is not a valid string function.
Incorrect: This will append a space character to the end of myList.
Correct: This will use the space character to join the items in myList. Note, if myList has non-string types then the join operation will most likely cause an error.
Incorrect: This will attempt to use an invalid collect() string function.
